text: hello friends today's recipe is pretty
fun because it uses a convenience item a
rotisserie chicken it's pulled chicken
with a cucumber and apple slaw I'm a
huge fan of apple and cucumber together
and the cooling mists of it is really
nice with a sort of tangy almost
barbecue like Miss of this pulled
chicken so start off by making your slaw
cut your Apple into julienne nice and
fine you can grade it if you want to but
I don't like it to be quite that fine if
you have a mandolin you can use that to
cut on as well transfer it to a bowl
with some cucumbers this is two English
cucumbers also cut into matchsticks and
the apples can go right in there add a
quarter cup of mayo and some sliced
scallion a couple tablespoons give that
a toss it's very lightly dressed you can
always add more if you'd like there's
your slaw now for your chicken like I
said you can get any rotisserie chicken
they're usually about two and a half
pounds you remove the meat and the skin
you don't need the skin for this and
then shred your chicken into pieces use
the dark meat and the light meat shred
it up and make chicken salad too if you
want to now you make a little sauce 1/4
cup of honey
did somebody spray this for me did you
see how cleanly that came out somebody
sprayed this with Pam before I used it I
didn't know it but look how cleanly that
came out if you spray your measuring cup
with Pam all your honey comes right out
add a quarter cup of water 3 tablespoons

you can heat this all together for a few
minutes all right I think I want to
whisk this just a little bit
Mustard's clumping up a little bit you

we go
